<Meta title="Docs/Theme/Example" />

# Theme Example

Below is an example of a theme implemented using the tailwind
classes. This a part of theme is the `darkTheme` that is
used in the Storybook stories.

```ts
import { PartialReablocksTheme, ButtonTheme } from 'reablocks';

const buttonTheme: ButtonTheme = {
  base: 'inline-flex whitespace-no-wrap select-none items-center justify-center px-2.5 py-1 rounded text-gray-100',
  disabled: 'disabled:cursor-not-allowed data-[variant=filled]:disabled:bg-gray-600 disabled:text-gray-400 border-gray-500',
  fullWidth: 'block w-full',
  group: 'rounded-none first:rounded-s last:rounded-e border-s-0 first:border-s',
  groupText: 'border border-y-transparent border-l-transparent last:border-r-transparent hover:bg-initial',
  adornment: {
    base: 'flex',
    start: '',
    end: '',
    sizes: {
      small: '[&>svg]:w-3 [&>svg]:h-3',
      medium: '[&>svg]:w-4 [&>svg]:h-4',
      large: '[&>svg]:w-5 [&>svg]:h-5'
    }
  },
  sizes: {
    small: 'text-xs px-5px py-0.5 leading-[normal]',
    medium: 'text-base px-2.5 py-5px leading-[normal]',
    large: 'text-xl px-5 py-2.5 leading-[normal]'
  },
  variants: {
    filled: 'bg-gray-800 text-white hover:bg-gray-700 border-gray-800',
    outline: 'bg-opacity-0 border-grey border',
    text: 'bg-opacity-0 border-0'
  },
  colors: {
    primary:
      'bg-primary-600 hover:bg-primary-700 border-primary-600 text-white',
    secondary:
      'bg-secondary-700 hover:bg-secondary-800 border-secondary-700 text-white',
    success:
      'bg-success-700 hover:bg-success-800 border-success-700 text-white',
    warning:
      'bg-warning-700 hover:bg-warning-800 border-warning-700 text-white',
    error: 'bg-error-700 hover:bg-error-800 border-error-700 text-white'
  }
};

const customTheme: PartialReablocksTheme = {
  components: {
    button: buttonTheme,
    // other components themes
  }
};
```
